author: Reuters
description: A Google AI program defeated a Chinese grand master at the ancient board game Go, a major feather in the cap for the firm.
title: Google AI Just Beat a Chinese Master in the Ancient Game of Go

author: Jordan Novet
description: To deliver Google Fiber in Huntsville, Alabama, Alphabet is doing something unconventional: leasing part of the city's fiber network.
title: Alphabet's cost cutting is on display as Google Fiber rolls out in Huntsville

description: Google’s latest effort to thaw relations with China involves an artificial intelligence pow-wow -- and a game of Go.
title: Google Cozies Up to China With AI Secrets And a Game of Go

author: Reuters
description: Google's artificial intelligence program, AlphaGo, beat Chinese Go master Ke Jie for a second time on Thursday.
title: Google’s AlphaGo Just Beat the Top Chinese Go Master Again

author: MICHAEL LIEDTKE
description: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) — Google already monitors online shopping — and now it's keeping an eye on physical stores to try to sell more digital advertising. The internet company said Tuesday that a new tool will track how much money people spend in merchants' brick-and-mortar stores after clicking on their digital ads. The analysis will be done by matching the combined ad clicks of people who are logged into Google services with their collective purchases on credit and debit cards. Google says it won't be able to examine the specific items purchased or how much a specific individual spent.
title: Google helps advertisers track spending in physical stores
